column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
A brief narrative of the changes I made
- Reduce number of Site-to-Site VPN connections from 24 to 15
- Decrease the number of instance EC2 from 8 to 4
- Use db.m1.xlarge instead of db.m2.xlarge RDS instance
